channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Wrong infomation, 13th November
item.description:
The directional sign on Cranbourn street has been spun around some how and gives wrong directions now. It is opposite Leicester square tube station exit .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): St Martin's Court, Bloomsbury, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Several wardrobe parts left by 1 Pennethorne Road, 13th November
item.description:
This appeared overnight/early morning on 13 November. Lots of wardrobe pieces right next to our flat. Lots of things seem to be being dumped in this area, possibly related to new flats on the end of the street (the beehive building)

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Pennethorne Road, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside Manor Lodge and all around Vale of Health, 13th November
item.description:
The pavements and roads are becoming so slippery due to the amount of leave fall. Can some one send a team done here to sort the problem out? The road sweeper only comes once in a while and only makes piles. Not good enough.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 12, Vale of Health, West Hampstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Westmoreland Road, Widmore, London

item.title: Many many shards of broken glass on the pavement outside 163 Powerscroft Rd, 13th November
item.description:
A bottle appears to have been smashed, creating a very large number of shards of broken glass, outside 163 Powerscroft Rd. I apologise that I am not fixing this myself, but unfortunately I do not have a dustpan and brush easily to hand at the moment

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Powerscroft Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Street lamp is off., 13th November

item.title: Dangerous dustcart driving..., 13th November
item.description:
I have no idea where to report this: at 9.50am on 11th November, a Hackney bin lorry was being driven wildly and dangerously down Church St. to the point where it looked out of control. There were three men sitting in the front. The public notices this.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Stoke Newington Church Street, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damaged pole and Safety barriers blocking view causing accident risk, 13th November
item.description:
This lamp post was damaged more than a month ago when a van hit it and overturned. The maintenance folks cut the lamp post and put safety barriers around it. I live in 30 Sundridge Avenue and have been waiting for this to be repaired. Its a safety risk as you can see from pictures. Whenever anyone in my family is driving out of the drive way, the sight of view to oncoming traffic is blocked and its causing a risk of accident. Can this be attended to asap.,

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sundridge Avenue, Elmstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Gallions Road, Charlton

item.title: Council does not clean, 13th November
item.description:
I am writing to complain about the poor cleaning services provided by the council. Rubbish has been piling up at the entrance of our block, creating an unpleasant and unhygienic environment.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Livermere Road, Hackney, London
